items.subject: New Project Assignment
items.preview: You have been assigned to a new project: E-commerce Platform
items.message:
Dear Rohan Sharma,

You have been given the position of Project Manager of the E-commerce Platform tech management project. Please review the project details and schedule a meeting with your team.

Regards,
Management

items.subject: Meeting Reminder
items.preview: Reminder: Weekly Team meeting tomorrow at 09:45 AM
items.message: This is a reminder that the Weekly Team meeting is scheduled for tomorrow at 10:00 AM in Conference Room A. Please prepare your status updates and be on time.

items.subject: Budget Approval Required
items.preview: Your approval is needed for the Database Migration project budget
items.message: The Database Migration project requires additional budget allocation. Please review the attached proposal and approve or reject the request by end of day.

items.subject: System Maintenance
items.message: The project management system will be undergoing scheduled maintenance this weekend from Saturday 8:00 PM to Sunday 2:00 AM. During this time, the system will be unavailable. Please plan your work accordingly.
